trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class that defines the methods, properties, and events common to all HTML input controls, such as the <see langword="<input type=text>" />, <see langword="<input type=submit>" />, and <see langword="<input type= file>" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 用作定义所有 HTML 输入控件通用的方法、属性和事件的抽象基类，如 <see langword="<input type=text>" />、<see langword="<input type=submit>" /> 和 <see langword="<input type= file>" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl> class directly.

Instead, this class is inherited by other classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile> classes, to provide common basic functionality.
trans-unit.target: 相反，此类由其他类继承，如<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputCheckBox>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputHidden>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile>类，以提供通用的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The type of input control.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl> class using the specified input control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>类使用的指定的输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of this class is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: 不直接创建此类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called from the constructor of other HTML control classes to initialize properties defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: 从其他 HTML 控件类来初始化此类中定义的属性的构造函数调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>。

trans-unit.source: Property
Initial value
The value of the `type` parameter.
The following table shows the different possible values for `type`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的不同可能值`type`。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
text
A text box for data entry.
trans-unit.target: 用于数据输入的文本框。

trans-unit.source: password
A text box that masks user input.
trans-unit.target: 屏蔽用户输入的文本框。

trans-unit.source: checkbox
A check box that indicates a true or false condition.
trans-unit.target: 一个复选框，指示 true 或 false 的条件。

trans-unit.source: radio
A radio button that indicates a selection from a mutually exclusive group of radio buttons.
trans-unit.target: 指示从互相排斥的一组单选按钮选择单选按钮。

trans-unit.source: button
A command button.
submit
A button that submits the form to the server.
trans-unit.target: 提交到服务器窗体的按钮。

trans-unit.source: reset
A button that clears the form.
file
A button that uploads a file.
hidden
A non-visible field on a Web page used to persist information between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上使用，用于保留信息之间的不可见字段发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: image
An image button.
Gets or sets the unique identifier name for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> 控件的唯一标识符名。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A> property to determine the unique identifier name for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A>属性来确定的唯一标识符名称<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中，`get`访问器返回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`set`访问器不会分配给此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A> property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for most controls to work properly.
trans-unit.target: `set`因为访问器不会对此属性分配一个值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A>属性必须具有相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>大多数控件，使其正常工作的属性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl> class can override this implementation, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 继承自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>如有必要，类可以重写此实现中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A> property to determine the name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A>属性来确定的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>的被单击。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the output stream to render to the client.
trans-unit.target: 包含要在客户端上呈现的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the attributes of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> control to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> 控件的特性呈现给指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method renders a `name` attribute and `type` attribute before calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>方法呈现`name`属性和`type`之前调用基类的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" />.
A string that contains the type of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: Use this property get the type of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>.
The following table shows the different possible values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的不同可能值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
text
A text box for data entry.
trans-unit.target: 用于数据输入的文本框。

trans-unit.source: password
A text box that masks user input.
trans-unit.target: 屏蔽用户输入的文本框。

trans-unit.source: checkbox
A check box that indicates a true or false condition.
trans-unit.target: 一个复选框，指示 true 或 false 的条件。

trans-unit.source: radio
A radio button that indicates a selection from a mutually exclusive group of radio buttons.
trans-unit.target: 指示从互相排斥的一组单选按钮选择单选按钮。

trans-unit.source: button
A command button.
submit
A button that submits the form to the server.
trans-unit.target: 提交到服务器窗体的按钮。

trans-unit.source: reset
A button that clears the form.
file
A button that uploads a file.
hidden
A non-visible field on a Web page used to persist information between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上使用，用于保留信息之间的不可见字段发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: image
An image button.

The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A> property to determine the type of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>属性来确定的一种<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>的被单击。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" /> 控件关联的值。

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl" />.
Use this property to specify or determine the value associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定或确定与关联的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property is equivalent to the `value` attribute of HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>属性等效于`value`的 HTML 元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A> property to determine the text that the user entered into some text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Value%2A>属性来确定用户到某些文本框中输入的文本。
